Delayed cold orders.label: Delayed cold orders
Delayed cold orders.description: Orders delayed beyond 1 hour arrive cold without cancellation

High Pricing.label: High Pricing
High Pricing.description: Perceived overpricing of items in the app

Poor Food Quality.label: Poor Food Quality
Poor Food Quality.description: Food was undercooked and contained foreign objects.

Unaccountable delivery delays.label: Unaccountable delivery delays
Unaccountable delivery delays.description: Late deliveries with no meaningful resolution

Unresponsive support.label: Unresponsive support
Unresponsive support.description: Lack of proper response from customer service

Cash on delivery unavailability.label: Cash on delivery unavailability
Cash on delivery unavailability.description: Instamart does not offer cash on delivery payment option

Missing items in delivery.label: Missing items in delivery
Missing items in delivery.description: Customer reports receiving fewer items than ordered, with no refund offered due to lack of proof.
